20101205233802.000|20101205233804.000|CCO|JULIAN ASSANGE IS THREATENING TO
20101205233804.000|20101205233806.000|CCO|RELEASE THE ARCHIVE OF DOCUMENTS
20101205233806.000|20101205233808.000|CCO|IF HIS WEB SITE IS SHUT DOWN OR 
20101205233808.000|20101205233810.000|CCO|HE'S ARRESTED.
20101205233810.000|20101205233812.000|CCO|ASSANGE TOLD ONLINE READERS THAT
20101205233812.000|20101205233813.429|CCO|MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE 
20101205233813.429|20101205233814.857|CCO|WORLDWIDE HAVE ALREADY 
20101205233814.857|20101205233816.286|CCO|DOWNLOADED THE HEAVILY ENCRYPTED
20101205233816.286|20101205233817.714|CCO|FILES.
20101205233817.714|20101205233819.143|CCO|IF SOMETHING HAPPENS TO US, THE 
20101205233819.143|20101205233820.571|CCO|KEY PARTS WILL BE RELEASED 
20101205233820.571|20101205233822.000|CCO|AUTOMATICALLY, HE WROTE.

20101205233825.333|20101205233828.667|CCO|INCLUDE DOCUMENTS ON BP, BANK OF
20101205233828.667|20101205233832.000|CCO|AMERICA AND GUANTANAMO BAY WITH 
20101205233832.000|20101205233833.667|CCO|ONE REPORTEDLY CALLED INSURANCE 
20101205233833.667|20101205233835.333|CCO|LOCKED BY A 256-DIGIT COLD THAT 
20101205233835.333|20101205233837.000|CCO|ONLY ASSANGE KNOWS.

20101205233840.333|20101205233842.000|CCO|GO OFF THE SECOND THAT THEY 
20101205233842.000|20101205233843.667|CCO|RELEASE THE KEY.
20101205233843.667|20101205233845.333|CCO|AND THE KEY WILL SPREAD AROUND 
20101205233845.333|20101205233847.000|CCO|THE INTERNET IN A MATTER OF

20101205235041.286|20101205235042.000|CCO|    STOMACH BLEEDING AND ULCERS.

20101205235043.111|20101205235044.222|CCO|
20101205235044.222|20101205235045.333|CCO|    HAD AN ASTHMA ATTACK, HIVES,
20101205235045.333|20101205235046.444|CCO|  OR OTHER ALLERGIES TO ASPIRIN,
20101205235046.444|20101205235047.556|CCO|    
20101205235047.556|20101205235048.667|CCO|    NSAIDS OR SULFONAMIDES.
20101205235048.667|20101205235049.778|CCO|GET HELP RIGHT AWAY IF YOU HAVE
20101205235049.778|20101205235050.889|CCO|
